name: Careful Planning (V)
Lore: 'Alliance troops on planet must plan ahead to achieve success in military operations.',
Text: 'If your starting location was a system, deploy from Reserve Deck a related site (must be a battleground if the system is a non-battleground or Endor) with < 3 [Light Side Force] icons and up to three Effects that are always [Immune to Alter].  Place this Interrupt in Lost Pile.(Original concept by Kevin Brownell - Illinois States 2004)(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
